name: template-single-page-webpack-vue
description: 基于webpack 的单页vue项目模板

scripts.dev:page: npx cross-env BUILD_ENV=dev npx webpack-dev-server --config build/webpack.dev.config.js
scripts.build:page:dev: npx cross-env BUILD_ENV=dev npx webpack --config build/webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.build:page:test: npx cross-env BUILD_ENV=test npx webpack --config build/webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.build:page:prod: npx cross-env BUILD_ENV=prod npx webpack --config build/webpack.prod.config.js

author: misitebao
